sentences.en: food imports from abroad
sentences.cn: 从外国进口的食物

sentences.en: goods imported from abroad
sentences.cn: 从国外进口的商品

sentences.en: He will stand in for Mr Goh when he is abroad.
sentences.cn: 吴先生出国时由他代替。

sentences.en: I had always been attracted by the idea of working abroad.
sentences.cn: 我总是向往去国外工作。

sentences.en: I’ve never lived abroad before.
sentences.cn: 我以前从未在国外生活过。

sentences.en: Most of those who left the province to work abroad were unskilled.
sentences.cn: 那些离开该省出国打工的人大部分都未经专门训练。

sentences.en: My work takes me abroad a lot.
sentences.cn: 由于工作原因，我经常出国。

sentences.en: Sampling the local cuisine is one of the delights of holidaying abroad.
sentences.cn: 品尝当地菜肴是海外度假的乐趣之一。

sentences.en: She gives frequent performances of her work, both at home and abroad.
sentences.cn: 她经常在国内外演出自己的作品。

sentences.en: She often goes abroad on business.
sentences.cn: 她经常出国公干。

sentences.en: She remained bitterly opposed to the idea of moving abroad.
sentences.cn: 她仍然强烈反对移居国外。

sentences.en: Solti will continue to conduct here and abroad.
sentences.cn: 索尔蒂将继续在国内外担任指挥。

sentences.en: The booklet initiates us into the problems of living abroad.
sentences.cn: 这本小册子使我们对国外的生活情况有了初步了解.

sentences.en: The books about Harry Potter have been very popular, both at home and abroad .
sentences.cn: 有关哈利·波特的书在国内外一直都很流行。

sentences.en: The pitfalls of working abroad are numerous.
sentences.cn: 到国外工作存在许多陷阱。

sentences.en: The union is particularly concerned at the sourcing of products abroad.
sentences.cn: 该联盟尤其关注海外的产品货源。

sentences.en: They follow minutely the news from abroad on Cable News Network.
sentences.cn: 他们密切追踪有线电视新闻网上的国外新闻。

sentences.en: We buy everything abroad with the money earned from oil imports.
sentences.cn: 我们用进口石油赚到的钱从国外购买一切商品。

sentences.en: We never travelled abroad when we were kids.
sentences.cn: 我们小时候从来没有去国外旅行过。

sentences.en: Working abroad should be an exciting and positive experience for all concerned.
sentences.cn: 在海外工作对所有相关人员来说都应该是一段让人兴奋而愉快的经历。
